<script>$(function(){
    PositionMPU1();
});
$(window).resize(function(){
   PositionMPU1();
});

function PositionMPU1(){
    
    if( $(window).width() < 768)
        {     
            if($(".homepage-content-wrapper .sqs-row").length > 1 ) 
            {
                $("<aside class='placeholder-mpu1'").insertBefore($("homepage-sidebar-ad-a"));
                var mpuAsideHome = $("homepage-sidebar-ad-a").detach();
                $(".homepage-content-wrapper .sqs-row").first().append(mpuAsideHome);
            }
            else{
                if($(".article-list article p") )
                {
                    $("<aside class='placeholder-mpu1'/>").insertBefore($("#page-sidebar-ad-a"));
                    var mpuAside = $("#page-sidebar-ad-a").detach();
                    mpuAside.insertAfter($(".article-wrapper article p").first());
                }
                else if($(".article-wrapper article"))
                {
                    $("<aside class='placeholder-mpu1'").insertBefore($("#page-sidebar-ad-a"));
                    var mpuAside = $("#page-sidebar-ad-a").detach();
                    mpuAside.insertAfter($(".article-wrapper article").first());
                }          
            }
        }
    else{
        //move back if placeholder
        var placeholder = $(".placeholder-mpu1");
        if(placeholder.length)
            {
                if($(".homepage-content-wrapper .sqs-row").length > 1 ) 
                    {
                        var mpuAsideHome = $("homepage-sidebar-ad-a").detach();
                        mpuAsideHome.insertAfter(placeholder);
                        placeholder.remove();
                }
                else
                    {
                    if($(".article-list article p") )
                    {
                        var mpuAside = $("#page-sidebar-ad-a").detach();
                        mpuAside.insertAfter(placeholder);
                        placeholder.remove();
                    }
                        else{
                        if($(".article-list article p") )
                        {
                            var mpuAside = $("#page-sidebar-ad-a").detach();
                            mpuAside.insertAfter(placeholder);
                            placeholder.remove();
                        }  
                            
                        }
                }
            }              
        }
    
};</script>

<script>
  $(function(){
    DisplayTagPrice();
  });
  function DisplayTagPrice(){
    var spantest = $(".tags").first().find('a:contains("Price £")');
    var testifdone = $( "h2[id='pricetag']"); 
    if( spantest.length > 0)
    {
        var priceText = (spantest[0].innerHTML).replace('-','.');
        $(".entry-title").first().append("<h2 id='pricetag'>" + priceText + "</h2>");  
    }
  }
</script>

<script>

	$("span.summary-carousel-pager-next, .sqs-gallery-controls .next").bind("click",function(){
